mapper.select: select tours_id, tours_price, tours_discount, tours_begin, tours_end, tours_count, tours_time, tours_other, tours_detail, tours_name from travel_tours where tours_id = #{toursId}
mapper.insert: insert into travel_tours(tours_price, tours_discount, tours_begin, tours_end, tours_count, tours_time, tours_other, tours_detail, tours_name) values (#{toursPrice}, #{toursDiscount}, #{toursBegin}, #{toursEnd}, #{toursCount}, #{toursTime}, #{toursOther}, #{toursDetail}, #{toursName})

insert into travel_tours(tours_price, tours_discount, tours_begin, tours_end, tours_count, tours_time, tours_other, tours_detail, tours_name) values
(#{entity.toursPrice}, #{entity.toursDiscount}, #{entity.toursBegin}, #{entity.toursEnd}, #{entity.toursCount}, #{entity.toursTime}, #{entity.toursOther}, #{entity.toursDetail}, #{entity.toursName})

insert into travel_tours(tours_price, tours_discount, tours_begin, tours_end, tours_count, tours_time, tours_other, tours_detail, tours_name) values
(#{entity.toursPrice}, #{entity.toursDiscount}, #{entity.toursBegin}, #{entity.toursEnd}, #{entity.toursCount}, #{entity.toursTime}, #{entity.toursOther}, #{entity.toursDetail}, #{entity.toursName})
on duplicate key update tours_price = values(tours_price), tours_discount = values(tours_discount), tours_begin = values(tours_begin), tours_end = values(tours_end), tours_count = values(tours_count), tours_time = values(tours_time), tours_other = values(tours_other), tours_detail = values(tours_detail), tours_name = values(tours_name)
mapper.update:
update travel_tours
tours_price = #{toursPrice},
tours_discount = #{toursDiscount},
tours_begin = #{toursBegin},
tours_end = #{toursEnd},
tours_count = #{toursCount},
tours_time = #{toursTime},
tours_other = #{toursOther},
tours_detail = #{toursDetail},
tours_name = #{toursName},
where tours_id = #{toursId}
